amendment.description: An amendment en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part E of House Report 117-381 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 2, 3, 7, 11, 12, and 17.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendments (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 366 - 51 (Roll no. 282).
